thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Dollar Tree's quarterly same-store sales miss estimates, shares fall

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Dollar Tree's quarterly same-store sales miss estimates, shares fall
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Discount store operator Dollar Tree Inc reported holiday quarter same-store sales that missed analystsâ€™ estimates on Wednesday, sending its shares down as much as 13 percent in premarket trade.
Sales at established stores rose 2.4 percent, lower than the average analyst estimate of 2.73 percent, according to Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S.
Net income rose to $1.04 billion, or $4.37 per share, in the fourth quarter ended Feb. 3, from $321.8 million, or $1.36 per share, a year earlier.
Net sales rose to $6.36 billion from $5.64 billion.
Reporting by Nivedita Balu in Bengaluru
